thread.title: Actor Daniel Craig: I'm over James Bond

author: senh
title: Actor Daniel Craig: I'm over James Bond
text: BING NEWS: Actor Daniel Craig: I'm over James Bond LONDON (AP) — Actor Daniel Craig has said he wants to move on from the James Bond franchise and that, for now, he would rather slit his wrists than do another Bond movie. In an interview with Time Out magazine, in which he was asked whether he could ... 10/8/2015 - 3:35 am | View Link Daniel Craig: Actor Is ‘Over’ Playing James Bond Daniel Craig has given the clearest indication yet that he will not play James Bond for a fifth time, saying he would rather “slash my wrists”. The actor, who reprises the role of the secret agent in his fourth Bond movie, Spectre, this November told ... 10/8/2015 - 3:34 am | View Link Daniel Craig was paid HOW MUCH to be Bond? Actor is the highest paid 007 ever Double oh my goodness will Daniel Craig be banking a lot of cash for his role in Spectre ... so it would seem likely that there is a lot going on in the background.’ The odds of the next James Bond being female are 16/1. Emily’s name is the only ... 10/8/2015 - 1:36 am | View Link Daniel Craig Has Advice For The Next Bond Actor Before Daniel Craig even finishes his run as James Bond, fans are already asking, “Who’s going to play the character next?” We may see Craig in the role again after the upcoming Spectre, which comes out next month, but this guessing game isn’t ... 10/7/2015 - 12:07 pm | View Link Daniel Craig's advice to the next actor to play Bond? 'Don't be shit!' Spectre' isn't in cinemas yet, and already talk is turning to who will play James Bond after Daniel Craig. Let's be clear: Craig hasn't hung up his boots just yet. But in an exclusive, wide-ranging interview with Time Out he was happy to embrace the topic.
